patch 8.2.2480: Vim9: some errors for white space do not show context

Problem:    Vim9: some errors for white space do not show context.
Solution:   Include the text at the error.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2480: Vim9: some errors for white space do not show context · vim/vim@c3fc75d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2480: Vim9: some errors for white space do not show context · vim/vim@c3fc75d
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: some errors for white space do not show context. Solution: Include the text at the error.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/00385114dbd6a3d59516baa02e1ea86a1e7ee70e|patch 8.2.2479: set/getbufline test fails without the job feature>
patch 8.2.2479: set/getbufline test fails without the job feature

Problem:    set/getbufline test fails without the job feature.
Solution:   Check whether the job feature is supported. (Dominique Pellé,
            closes #7790)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2479: set/getbufline test fails without the job feature · vim/vim@0038511
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2479: set/getbufline test fails without the job feature · vim/vim@0038511
attachments.text: Problem: set/getbufline test fails without the job feature. Solution: Check whether the job feature is supported. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7790)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0dc5f603e9b86da9fe5798c231d8d6170501516e|patch 8.2.2478: MS-Windows: backup files for plugins are loaded>
patch 8.2.2478: MS-Windows: backup files for plugins are loaded

Problem:    MS-Windows: backup files for plugins are loaded.
Solution:   Do not use the alternate file name for files ending in "~".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2478: MS-Windows: backup files for plugins are loaded · vim/vim@0dc5f60
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2478: MS-Windows: backup files for plugins are loaded · vim/vim@0dc5f60
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: backup files for plugins are loaded. Solution: Do not use the alternate file name for files ending in "~".

Solution:   Skip a couple of tests.  Fix file name.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/983d83ff1cd796ff321074335fa53fbe7ac45a46|patch 8.2.2476: using freed memory when splitting window while closin…>
patch 8.2.2476: using freed memory when splitting window while closing buffer

Problem:    Using freed memory when using an autocommand to split a window
            while a buffer is being closed.
Solution:   Disallow splitting when the buffer has b_locked_split set.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2476: using freed memory when splitting window while closin… · vim/vim@983d83f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2476: using freed memory when splitting window while closin… · vim/vim@983d83f
attachments.text: …g buffer Problem: Using freed memory when using an autocommand to split a window while a buffer is being closed. Solution: Disallow splitting when the buffer has b_locked_split set.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2c7080bf1ceef4a7779644fd428b2386a0676794|patch 8.2.2474: using freed memory when window is closed by autocommand>
patch 8.2.2474: using freed memory when window is closed by autocommand

Problem:    Using freed memory when window is closed by autocommand.
            (houyunsong)
Solution:   Check the window pointer is still valid.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2474: using freed memory when window is closed by autocommand · vim/vim@2c7080b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2474: using freed memory when window is closed by autocommand · vim/vim@2c7080b
attachments.text: Problem: Using freed memory when window is closed by autocommand. (houyunsong) Solution: Check the window pointer is still valid.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8c6951fa2836a1ae3257770e7b927a9380439912|patch 8.2.2473: crash when leaving command line window triggers autoc…>
patch 8.2.2473: crash when leaving command line window triggers autocommand

Problem:    Crash when leaving command line window triggers autocommand.
            (houyunsong)
Solution:   Make sure not to close the current window or buffer.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2473: crash when leaving command line window triggers autoc… · vim/vim@8c6951f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2473: crash when leaving command line window triggers autoc… · vim/vim@8c6951f
attachments.text: …ommand Problem: Crash when leaving command line window triggers autocommand. (houyunsong) Solution: Make sure not to close the current window or buffer.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/aad5f9d79a2b71e9d2581eace3652be156102b9d|patch 8.2.2472: crash when using command line window in an autocommand>
patch 8.2.2472: crash when using command line window in an autocommand

Problem:    Crash when using command line window in an autocommand.
            (houyunsong)
Solution:   Save and restore au_new_curbuf.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2472: crash when using command line window in an autocommand · vim/vim@aad5f9d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2472: crash when using command line window in an autocommand · vim/vim@aad5f9d
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when using command line window in an autocommand. (houyunsong) Solution: Save and restore au_new_curbuf.
